content: this pocket shawl is one of my favorites because it is just so much fun to crochet the scarf pattern has a lacy part in the centre surrounded by a textured solid part add fringes to give a nice boho look the width and length are both adjustable there is a youtube tutorial that explains in detail and i have linked it at the end of this pattern skill advanced beginner easy beginner friendly tutorial available note i was hoping to finish the shawl in one skein of pound of love lion brand yarn unfortunately i ended up using a bit of my second skein of pound of love yarn you can use the leftover yarn for another project or pick a yarn that comes in smaller skeins finished size 60 / 152 5 cm long without fringes by 14 5 / 37 cm wide the size is adjustable the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english this is an 9 page pdf pattern it has written instructions for the crochet pattern and detailed pattern row by row notes with pictures it does not include finished product it can be made in any similar yarn suitable for your hook there is a youtube tutorial that explains in detail and i have linked it immediately after purchase you will receive a pdf
